New Races in Baldurs Gate 3

Baldurs Gate 3 adds new races to the game for players to experience. Players can now choose to create Dragonborn or Half-Orc characters, which provides a whole new set of Subrace options as well as additional appearance customization options including additional Chin and Jaw details and Tail features.
